title: Provided further that for redevelopment proposal of existing buildings by availing TDR/Additional FSI on payment of Premium, the fungible compensatory area admissible on FSI consumed in existing building shall be granted without charging premium, if existing user is proposed to be continued in proposed redevelopment then it shall be granted without charging premium
clause_text: Provided further that for redevelopment proposal of existing buildings by availing TDR/Additional FSI on payment of Premium, the fungible compensatory area admissible on FSI consumed in existing building shall be granted without charging premium, if existing user is proposed to be continued in proposed redevelopment then it shall be granted without charging premium..
